goals.active: Protect Gara while he makes his case.
goals.complete: My mentor and I helped Gara overcome the other shamans' resistance and convince the grawl that their "god" is nothing more than a ravenous dragon minion. Gara expressed a new concern, however: as soon as they realize no more offerings are coming, the hungry icebrood will come to devour everything and everyone in the village. We assured him that we will not let that happen.
